publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2875 Malcolm Chisholm: Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Amnesic Shellfish Poisoning) (West Coast) (No.3) (Scotland) Order 2002â€”That the Health and Community Care Committee in consideration of the Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Amnesic Shellfish Poisoning) (West Coast) (No.3) (Scotland) Order 2002 (SSI 2002/80) recommends that the order be approved. Supported by: Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Hugh Henry*
